name: serve
shortDescription: Builds and serves your application, rebuilding on file changes.

options.name: allowed-hosts
options.description: The hosts that the development server will respond to. This option sets the Vite option of the same name. For further details: https://vite.dev/config/server-options.html#server-allowedhosts

options.name: build-target
options.description: A build builder target to serve in the format of `project:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

options.name: configuration
options.description:
One or more named builder configurations as a comma-separated list as specified in the "configurations" section in angular.json.
The builder uses the named configurations to run the given target.
For more information, see https://angular.dev/reference/configs/workspace-config#alternate-build-configurations.

options.name: headers
options.description: Custom HTTP headers to be added to all responses.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: hmr
options.description: Enable hot module replacement. Defaults to the value of 'liveReload'. Currently, only global and component stylesheets are supported.

options.name: host
options.description: Host to listen on.

options.name: inspect
options.description: Activate debugging inspector. This option only has an effect when 'SSR' or 'SSG' are enabled.

options.name: live-reload
options.description: Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

options.name: open
options.description: Opens the url in default browser.

options.name: poll
options.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

options.name: port
options.description: Port to listen on.

options.name: prebundle
options.description: Enable and control the Vite-based development server's prebundling capabilities. To enable prebundling, the Angular CLI cache must also be enabled.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an application or a library.

options.name: proxy-config
options.description: Proxy configuration file. For more information, see https://angular.dev/tools/cli/serve#proxying-to-a-backend-server.

options.name: serve-path
options.description: The pathname where the application will be served.

options.name: ssl
options.description: Serve using HTTPS.

options.name: ssl-cert
options.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

options.name: ssl-key
options.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Adds more details to output logging.

options.name: watch
options.description: Rebuild on change.
